modName: Dark Brotherhood Members - A Follower Mod
summary: Have you ever been annoyed about the fact you only get 2-3 followers after completing the Dark Brotherhood Questline? I know I was! So I created this follower mod!
descriptionHtml:
[left][/left][center][color=#900000][size=4][/size][/color][/center][center][color=#900000][size=4]DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS MOD IF YOU HAVE NOT COMPLETED THE DARK BROTHERHOOD QUESTLINE 
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Have you ever been annoyed that you only get 2/3 Dark Brotherhood followers? I was, so I created this mod! It adds seven new followers:
 [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Ma Reejo a Khajiit
 [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Breish a Dark Elf
 [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Rebecca a Nord
 [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Dark Brotherhood Initiate an Argonian 
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Elizabeta a Wood Elf
 [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Dushnilk an Orc
 [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Elliza Darken-Lex a Dark Elf [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]and a merchant High Elf, Hiyelle.
 [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Rebecca is trained in One handed weapons, Light armor and Archery [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Ma Reejo is trained in Two handed weapons light armor and alteration [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Breish is trained in One handed weapons, Light armor and Destruction [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Dark Brotherhood initiate is trained in Destruction, Restoration, Alteration, One Handed, Light Armor and Illusion [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Elizabeta is trained in Destruction, Restoration and Light Armor. [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Dushnilk is trained in Heavy Armour, One Handed, Two Handed and Block. [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Elliza Darken-Lex is trained in Destruction, Restoration, and Alteration. [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]This mod also adds some other needed things to the sanctuary, like more mannequins and more Dark Brotherhood Armor. [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]
[/size][/color]
[size=3]The mod also includes the new NPCs using the old dialogue from the previous members.[/size]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#900000][size=5]If you like the mod, please endorse it![/size][/color]
Please report any bugs!

[color=#900000][size=6]AND ENJOY[/size][/color][/center][center][color=#900000][size=6][/size][/color][/center][center][/center]
author: TheOscar0
